QuestData.Title: A Strong Back
QuestData.Description: Some of our trainees have... larger-than normal appetites. We have occasionally had difficulty supplying enough food for all of them. In times like these, we have to ask for help.$b$bA kindly older woman, who lives in a small house to the northwest, has agreed to make some stew for our trainees. All you need to do is go and get it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain a Boiling Cauldron from Mother Wu in the Waxwood Forest, then return to Groundskeeper Wu in the Tian Monastery.
QuestData.CompletionText: She really is a nice woman. And an excellent cook.$b$bThe best cook in the world, actually.
QuestData.RewardText: I will see to it that this stew is distributed evenly and appropriately among the trainees.$b$bAfter I set some aside for myself, of course.
